name: $mode
desc: Returns: Identifies whether this portion of the statement is describing the ability to initiate or receive restful operations.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies whether this portion of the statement is describing the ability to initiate or receive restful operations.

name: $documentation
desc: Returns: Information about the system's restful capabilities that apply across all applications, such as security.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information about the system's restful capabilities that apply across all applications, such as security.

name: $security
desc: Returns: Information about security implementation from an interface perspective - what a client needs to know.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information about security implementation from an interface perspective - what a client needs to know.

name: $resource
desc: Returns: A specification of the restful capabilities of the solution for a specific resource type.

name: $addresource
desc: A specification of the restful capabilities of the solution for a specific resource type.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A specification of the restful capabilities of the solution for a specific resource type.

name: $interaction
desc: Returns: A specification of restful operations supported by the system.

name: $addinteraction
desc: A specification of restful operations supported by the system.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A specification of restful operations supported by the system.

name: $compartment
desc: Returns: An absolute URI which is a reference to the definition of a compartment that the system supports. The reference is to a CompartmentDefinition resource by its canonical URL .

name: $addcompartment
desc: An absolute URI which is a reference to the definition of a compartment that the system supports. The reference is to a CompartmentDefinition resource by its canonical URL .

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI which is a reference to the definition of a compartment that the system supports. The reference is to a CompartmentDefinition resource by its canonical URL .
